subject: Airlines and Airplanes
Accidents and Safety
Basketball
lead_paragraph: After a plane crash took away their son Will as he traveled with the Oklahoma State basketball team in 2001, Bill and Nicki Hancock are coping by taking a cross-country trip.
snippet: After a plane crash took away their son Will as he traveled with the Oklahoma State basketball team in 2001, Bill and Nicki Hancock are coping by taking a cross-country trip.
